data.title: Singer/Songwriter – Songs of Social Significance
data.text:
Dear world:

Plans for the Cultural Ministry WORLD TOUR include:

Illinois and Wisconsin in August

Visits to Michigan, Ohio, and British Columbia in September

November in Belgium and Scandinavia

March 2025 in England, Scotland, Wales, and Ireland

Info about upcoming gigs confirmed so far at davidrovics.com/tour — and more gigs wanted!

If you’re local to Portland, Oregon, please join Portland Emergency Eviction Response. Another Portland is possible!

I do concerts for children, too! Totally different material. Check out my children’s music section for more info!

If you join my email list via Substack and/or follow me on Songkick or Bandsintown you can stay on top of future concerts in your area, when I’m touring.

New songs, rants, blog posts, interviews, and/or concerts go out to my email list regularly, most of which can be found if you look for This Week with David Rovics on various platforms where podcasts can be found, or at davidrovics.com/thisweek. Essays and podcasts all also get posted on Patreon and Substack.

I post essays, podcasts, new songs, songs related to this date in history and other things regularly on X/Twitter, Reddit, YouTube, Telegram, and Facebook, where there’s also a David Rovics Group. I also post regularly on Patreon, Soundcloud and occasionally on Instagram.

Mostly I put out content for free, but for members of my Community-Supported Art program I also provide cool, exclusive materials, both digital and physical. Members of my CSA who signed up through my website as well as patrons on Patreon, paid subscribers on Bandcamp and Substack, and members on YouTube (click “Join”) make it possible for me to continue doing this full-time.

One-off donations are also very welcome!

Podcast
